introduction: If a fault is discovered in a vehicle make or model after manufacturing it might be recalled. To find out if a vehicle has been recalled you can check online.
more_information:
You’ll need to know the vehicle’s:

- manufacturer
- model
- date of manufacture
overview: Check online if a vehicle make or model has been recalled because of a fault in manufacturing
title: Check if a vehicle model has been recalled
will_continue_on: the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA) website
